import React from 'react' import { FiAward } from 'react-icons/fi' import content from './content' import clsx from 'clsx' import styles from './Recommendation.module.css' export default function Recommendation() { return (

See what people say about me

{content.map((recommendation, key) => (

"{recommendation.quote}"

{recommendation.title}
))}
) }
